Finger Licking Good!: Take a break from your busy business schedules or need a boost before heading back to your school works or simply just enjoying a leisurely family outing; do drop by here to enjoy a great bowl of your favourite dessert. In Mom's Kitchen, we remain committed to serve fresh and tasty desserts. And we stay open every day to serve to all our customers’ needs. So come visit us soon.

Purple Sage cooks a range of delicious dishes from fresh, local produce. Using a high level of technical skill, they are able to achieve fusion of flavours by taking a modern twist on traditional recipes. Their food contains only the finest, natural ingredients and contains less oil & less salt.
Broth Asia soup makes you feel warm inside. Happy, safe, comforted, and at home. Each one is unique, an expression of the culture that inspired it and the home cooking that created it.
68 Orchard Rd, Plaza Singapura, #B1-21/2: 252 North Bridge Road, #B1-62 Rafffles City Shopping Centre, 179103, 179103

Finger Licking Good!: Fusion Spoon is a unique casual dining place for families and friends Visitors can enjoy a wide selection of affordable food and beverages from various cuisine choices such as Western, Asian and Japanese. There is also a waffle and Korean bingsu ice kiosk at Fusion Spoon, for those looking for a little treat after a day out in the Gardens.
68 Orchard Rd, Plaza Singapura, #B1-21/2: Singapore Botanic Gardens, Tanglin Gate, 1 Cluny Rd, #B1-00, 259569
